1121170.name: Memory Of Psycho
1121170.description:
- Overview.
Memory Of Psycho is a game in which players relive the memories of a young man.

The player acts as the protagonist, a young man who has lost his memory.
Touching certain objects in the room where he woke up triggers flashbacks of his past memories.
By using hints and other information to act in the flashbacks at a predetermined time, the player can uncover what happened in the past one after another.

- Memory Recall.
In a flashback of a past memory, an event called “memory recall” occurs.
There is a time limit while the memory is being replayed, and if you do not take any action, you will leave the flashback.
Look for clues that exist in the room or in items, etc., and try to recall your memories until the end.
